description: The name of the Catalog to retrieve. This should be all lowercase.

parameters.name: CatalogId
parameters.description: The ID of the parent catalog in which the catalog resides. If none is provided, the Amazon Web Services Account Number is used by default.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The ID of the catalog. To grant access to the default catalog, this field should not be provided.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the catalog. Cannot be the same as the account ID.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) assigned to the catalog resource.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: Description string, not more than 2048 bytes long, matching the URI address multi-line string pattern. A description of the catalog.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: A map array of key-value pairs that define parameters and properties of the catalog.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the catalog was created.

nested_items.name: UpdateTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the catalog was last updated.

nested_items.name: TargetRedshiftCatalog
nested_items.description: A TargetRedshiftCatalog object that describes a target catalog for database resource linking.

nested_items.name: CatalogArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the catalog resource.

nested_items.name: FederatedCatalog
nested_items.description: A FederatedCatalog object that points to an entity outside the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: Identifier
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the federated catalog.

nested_items.name: ConnectionName
nested_items.description: The name of the connection to an external data source, for example a Redshift-federated catalog.

nested_items.name: CatalogProperties
nested_items.description: A CatalogProperties object that specifies data lake access properties and other custom properties.

nested_items.name: DataLakeAccessProperties
nested_items.description: A DataLakeAccessProperties object with input properties to configure data lake access for your catalog resource in the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: DataLakeAccess
nested_items.description: Turns on or off data lake access for Apache Spark applications that access Amazon Redshift databases in the Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: DataTransferRole
nested_items.description: A role that will be assumed by Glue for transferring data into/out of the staging bucket during a query.

nested_items.name: KmsKey
nested_items.description: An encryption key that will be used for the staging bucket that will be created along with the catalog.

nested_items.name: ManagedWorkgroupName
nested_items.description: The managed Redshift Serverless compute name that is created for your catalog resource.

nested_items.name: ManagedWorkgroupStatus
nested_items.description: The managed Redshift Serverless compute status.

nested_items.name: RedshiftDatabaseName
nested_items.description: The default Redshift database resource name in the managed compute.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A message that gives more detailed information about the managed workgroup status.

nested_items.name: CatalogType
nested_items.description: Specifies a federated catalog type for the native catalog resource. The currently supported type is aws:redshift.

nested_items.name: CustomProperties
nested_items.description: Additional key-value properties for the catalog, such as column statistics optimizations.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CreateTableDefaultPermissions
nested_items.description: An array of PrincipalPermissions objects. Creates a set of default permissions on the table(s) for principals. Used by Amazon Web Services Lake Formation. Not used in the normal course of Glue operations.

nested_items.name: Principal
nested_items.description: The principal who is granted permissions.

nested_items.name: DataLakePrincipalIdentifier
nested_items.description: An identifier for the Lake Formation principal.

nested_items.name: Permissions
nested_items.description: The permissions that are granted to the principal.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CreateDatabaseDefaultPermissions
nested_items.description: An array of PrincipalPermissions objects. Creates a set of default permissions on the database(s) for principals. Used by Amazon Web Services Lake Formation. Not used in the normal course of Glue operations.

nested_items.name: Principal
nested_items.description: The principal who is granted permissions.

nested_items.name: DataLakePrincipalIdentifier
nested_items.description: An identifier for the Lake Formation principal.

nested_items.name: Permissions
nested_items.description: The permissions that are granted to the principal.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AllowFullTableExternalDataAccess
nested_items.description: Allows third-party engines to access data in Amazon S3 locations that are registered with Lake Formation.
